description: A nasty headwind or sudden cold surge can make you want to skip your morning jaunt, reach for the car keys over your commuter bike, or miss an evening meet-up with friends. But with the Mtn. Tech/2™ Vest, you get a layer that's as comfortable as a fleece with the protection of a softshell backed with GORE-TEX Windstopper®.
name: Mountain Hardwear Mtn Tech/2 Vest - Mens
